00064 {
00065   ENTRY_AVAILABLE = 0x00,
00066   PAIRING_CONFIG_ENTRY = 0x01,

00068 } zgpSessionEntryStatus_t;

00136   {
00137     // pairing config specific fields
00138     struct
00139     {
00140       ZGP_SinkTableEntry_t sinkEntry;
00141       uint32_t entryTimestamp;

00143       APS_AddrMode_t addrMode;

00146     };
00147     // comm. req specific fields
00148     struct
00149     {

00157     };
00158   };
00159 } zgpCommReqPairingConfigSessionEntry_t;
